name: Ghost Notes
description:
In Ghost Notes, you are one of many space bounty hunters that have come to be known as Derringers. You travel the stars of the Bvalkoblian Empire in your stellartion the Garabel, in search of the vile group known as Dlelthor. With your trusty mambithan on your hip and your gun by your side, it's your job to clear out every last glempthorn in this sector.

Move with WASD and shoot with left click. Escape to unlock the mouse.
